mapper.insert: insert into group_permission(pk_permission, pk_group, group_code, group_name, pk_resource) values (#{pk_permission}, #{pk_group}, #{groupCode}, #{groupName}, #{pk_resource})
mapper.select: select pk_permission, pk_group, group_code as groupCode, group_name as groupName, pk_resource from group_permission where pk_group = #{pk_group}
mapper.insert: insert into group_user(pk_group, group_code, group_name) values (#{pk_group}, #{groupCode}, #{groupName})
mapper.select: select pk_group, group_code as groupCode, group_name as groupName from group_user
